question: I got confused about following fatwa, given by different mufti/scholars operating in different websites
answer:
QUESTION
I got confused about following fatwa, given by different mufti/scholars operating in different websites with different/contradictory answers for the same question. I can't understand which answer I should follow as fatwa contradics with each other. I really get confused. Please help me out.

Allah Hafiz.


ANSWER


Share:

We have no idea of the question you are referring to. Nevertheless, you should find out regarding an Aalim in your locality who is part of the Ahlus Sunnah wal Jamaa’ah and whose rulings mostly agree with the rulings of the Jamhoor (unanimous ruling of scholars) and rely upon his rulings.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
